title: Average Number of Sleep Time
body: It is believed that Lake Tahoe Community College (LTCC) Intermediate Algebra students get less than seven hours of sleep per night, on average. A survey of $$22$$ LTCC Intermediate Algebra students generated a mean of $$7.24$$ hours with a standard deviation of $$1.93$$ hours. At a level of significance of 5%, do LTCC Intermediate Algebra students get less than seven hours of sleep per night, on average?
